Packages that use PersistencePolicy.Cascade
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence Provides the classes necessary for mapping and persisting data between domain objects and database tables. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl Provides concrete implementations for the persistence framework.
